1. I
hereby consent to authorize Medeor 24x7 Hospital, its working physicians and its health professionals to render all medical care to myself or to my dependent, including Physical Examinations, Radiology Examinations, Laboratory tests, Blood and blood products, Injections and /or administration of pharmaceutical products / Medications, use of local anesthetics and other invasive procedures as necessary or advisable in the judgement of the hospital's physicians and health professionals. I have not been given any guarantees to the results of the services I will receive.
2. Access to Medical Records: I hereby consent that relevant Medeor 24x7 Hospital staff may access my personal medical records for processing insurance claims, quality review, medico-legal auditing purposes or as directed by the Hospital Management. I hereby consent that Medeor 24x7 Hospital may release my medical records at the request of the Police, Court, Health Authority of Abu Dhabi, and my insurance company/payer. This is applicable while I remain a member of the Insurance Company after which the insurance company will obtain my consent for this purpose. I understand that all personnel accessing my records will maintain a professional standard of confidentiality and that will not jeopardize my right to high quality medical care in the future.
3. Consent for Release of Medical Information to insurance companies/payer: I, the undersigned, do hereby authorize my Insurance Company/Payer to have access to and take copies of all my files and records at any time relating to any healthcare services provided to me for services rendered under my insurance card during the period of my insurance coverage.
I understand that from time to time my insurance company /payer may need to disclose information related to my medical files and records to third parties for reasons related to insurance including but not limited to the processing of my Medical claim, research/statistical purposes or to prevent/control fraudulent or improper claims.
I hereby authorize my insurance company/payer to consult with and / or require me to attend a second opinion consultation or case management review with regard to the coverage of certain benefits as per my insurance coverage.
My insurance company/payer will ensure the confidentiality of all information it receives in relation to this Consent as required by the UAE Law.
4. I authorize Medeor 24x7 Hospital to release my treatment reports to the registered mail id.
5. Transfer: I agree, if I / my dependent's medical conditions require transferring me / my dependents from the hospital, ward or room to another hospital, ward or room if recommended by attending Physicians of Medeor 24x7 Hospital.
6. Cost Payment: I have been made aware of the estimated cost of treatment by the hospital. I accept the final cost as my responsibility, when presented at the end of the treatment. I agree to pay this cost in full to the hospital in the event of refusal of payment by my insurers, or by my employer in whole or in part of the medical bills or non-payment on time.
7. I understand that all my past and present medical information will be shared through ADHIE (Abu Dhabi Health Information Exchange) platform/portal as part of the Department of Health regulatory requirements to ensure better access (across the Emirate of Abu Dhabi), quality and continuity of care.
8. I have been made aware of the Hospital's Patient Rights and Responsibilities.
This Consent is valid as long as I am receiving treatment and care at Medeor 24x7 Hospital and pharmacies.
SUBSTITUTE CONSENT GIVER
If the patient cannot consent for him / herself, the consent must be obtained from the parent or nearby relative according to UAE law. If a family member is not available, it must be given by an appointed legal guardian.
